text-node.description: Renders the basket content.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Validates the basket against additional conditions
Remove all existing payment instruments from the basket

pipelet-node.description: Call GetBasket here because the current Basket in session is disconnected from the newly logged in customer.

text-node.description: This pipeline is called when quantity of any product is updated from cart page.
Should be used only for simple UI

By default, when a bundle is added to cart all its sub products gets added too, but if those products happens to be variants then we have to manually replace the master products with the selected variants which gets passed in the http params as childPids along with any options. Params: CurrentHttpParameterMap.childPids - comma separated list of pids of the bundled products which are variations
Refresh Minicart content when an AJAX Request is made.

Determines an existing basket from the current session. If a basket wasn't found, the pipeline ends in a named end node "error". This node can be used in other pipelines such as the checkout pipelines in order to access the basket. This pipeline does not create a new basket. Calling pipelines are responsible to properly react on the "error" end node.

Determines an existing basket from the current session. If a basket wasn't found, a new basket is created. If a new basket couldn't be created, the pipeline ends in a named end node "error". Calling pipelines are responsible to properly react on the "error" end node.
Renders a minified version of the basket.
This pipeline is used to display InStore Pickup (BOPUS) option on PDP and Cart page.
Add bonus product to cart.
Add a sub product to the bonus product bundle.
When adding a new product to the cart check to see if it has triggered a new bonus discount line item.
Adds multiple products to the basket. Uses multiple product IDs separated by comma.
Adds the product with the given ID to the wish list.
Inserts the Wish List into the pipeline dictionary if the customer is authenticated.
This pipeline is used to set boolean gift for gift box and gift message in product line item.
Removes product from mini cart. Renders mini cart and not a full cart.
Start the checkout process.
This pipeline will be called when user click on remove button from cart page.it will update the cart page after removing the line item from cart page
This pipeline will be called when user changes the line item quantity from dropdown.it will update the cart page with new selection
Set the Primary Shipping,Primar Billing and Primary Credit Card Information
Handle Expedited checkout process.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Copy the relevant credit card details to payment form

text-node.description: If 'stackProductInBasket' is set to "Yes" then for N quantity added in the basket, N number of ProductLineItems will be created of Quantity = "1".
Expedited checkout flow for customer having primary shipping,primary billing and primary payment credit card.
This Pipeline will check the instore qty against the store inventory in the case that the pli's qtyt has been updated.
This pipeline is used to create monogram ProductLineItem if monogramming is opted.

checkout/components/minicartredirect Start the checkout process. COBilling-UnlockGiftCards Cart-SetPrimaryShippingBillingPaymentInfo COBilling-Start Cart-Calculate
Eval (bc_api) Remove all existing payment instruments from the basket Script (bc_api) Validates the basket against additional conditions Script File: cart/ValidateCartForCheckout.ds error RemoveProduct COStart Script (bc_api) Script File: cart/RemoveProductLineItem.ds Cart-GetExistingBasket expression CurrentHttpParameterMap.parameterNames.contains('format') && CurrentHttpParameterMap.format.stringValue== 'minicartajax' Removes product from mini cart. Renders mini cart and not a full cart. Cart-Calculate
expression RemoveGiftCertificateErrorCount > 0 checkout/cart/minicart Cart-HandleExpeditedCheckout
GetPrimaryAddress.ds is also used in Coshipping PipeLine where both primary billing and primary shipping address are required thats why primary billing is not remove as an output
Assign Prorated Price on custom attribute
This will fetch the dummy product created in the BM. Input will be dummy product id fectched from site preference.
This script retrieves stores list from which products will be picked.
This will replace the dummy product added to the basket with the monogrammed product.
This assign node sets custom attributes “monogramEmbossCode”,” monogramInitials”, “monogramFontSize”,"monogramPreviewURL", "ProratedPrice" and "productLineItemId" in ProductLineItem.
The cart page provides various actions to be performed, e.g. line item editing, coupon redemption etc.
Calculates an existing basket. Call this pipeline always if the changes to the basket content is made (e.g. addition or removal of a product or gift certificate or setting of a shipping method).
